com.persistit.logging

Interface PersistitLogMessage.LogItem

  • Enclosing class:
    PersistitLogMessage

    public static interface PersistitLogMessage.LogItem
    Interface for a loggable item. Each location in the Persistit code base that potentially emits a log message uses an instance of LogItem. LogItem implementations may do (a) nothing, or (b) call a logging framework to emit the log message. This decision is made by the configure(PersistitLogger, PersistitLevel, String) method which is called each time the logging framework is set up or changed.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Returns:
        whether this log item is currently enabled for logging.

      • logMessage

        String logMessage(Object... args)
        Construct a log message consisting of this LogItem's template combined with values in the supplied argument list.
        Parameters:
        args - array of argument values that will be substituted into the log message
        Returns:
        the message as a string

      • log

        void log(Object... args)
        Emit a log message, or do nothing if this LogItem is disabled.
        Parameters:
        args - array of argument values that will be substituted into the log message

      • logRecurring

        void logRecurring(int count,
                  long duration,
                  Object... args)
        Emit a log message for a recurring event, or do nothing if this LogItem is disabled.
        Parameters:
        count - number of occurrences
        duration - period of time in duration array of argument values that will be substituted into the log message

      • getLevel

        PersistitLevel getLevel()
        Returns:
        This LogItem's log level, one of TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN or ERROR

      • configure

        void configure(PersistitLogger logger,
               PersistitLevel level,
               String message)
        Modify this LogItem to use the supplied PersistitLogger. If the logger enables logging for messages having the supplied level then configure this LogItem to emit log messages; else configure it to do nothing, causing the JIT to compile away all instructions for log(Object...) method.
        Parameters:
        logger - The PersistitLogger that emits log messages
        level - The PersistitLevel of this item
        message - A message template which forms the basis of the log message
